thread.title: BRIEF-Cegid Group Q3 revenue rises to 66.5 million euros
thread.title_full: BRIEF-Cegid Group Q3 revenue rises to 66.5 million euros

title: BRIEF-Cegid Group Q3 revenue rises to 66.5 million euros
text:
BRIEF-Cegid Group Q3 revenue rises to 66.5 million euros 
Oct 8 Cegid Group SA : 
* Q3 revenue 66.5 million euros ($75.0 million) versus 59.9 million euros year ago 
* Confirms its ambition for revenue growth and growth of current operating income for 2015 
Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: ($1 = 0.8864 euros) (Gdynia Newsroom:) Trending On Reuters
